name: Covéa
membership:
Member of AMICE
Member of FFA, a member of Insurance Europe
goal: Groupe d'assurance mutualiste, Covéa opére dans le domaine de l'assurance non vie, vie et santé. Le groupe Covéa réunit 3 enseignes majeures en France : MAAF, MMA et GMF. Avec plus de 26 000 collaborateurs, le groupe enregistre un chiffre d'affaires de plus de 16,5 milliards d'€ et compte près de 11 millions de clients sociétaires.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
Solvency II (Revision)
Consultation on retail financial services
CMU
IDD
Motor Insurance Directive (Revision)
Brexit
ESAs Review
Mobility Package (Connected and autonomous vehicles)
